suncertify.db
Class DatabaseFileUtils

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.db.DatabaseFileUtils

public class DatabaseFileUtils
extends java.lang.Object

The utilities for the database file. This is a singleton. It offers information on the database file, such as number of records in the database file.

Since:
31/03/2014
Author:
Luke GJ Potter
